name: Detective Beebo: Night at the Mansion
storyline: In Detective Beebo: Night at the Mansion you have been invited to a dinner party at an isolated manor by a mysterious ex-CEO. Unravel the chain of events leading up to the party, and meet the other guests in this story-rich point-and-click adventure game, as you discover the secret behind the curse of this mansion.
summary: Detective Beebo is a Point-and-click mystery romcom with puzzle elements.
